whyWorks.title: Why Reviewsvisor works?
whyWorks.lightningAnalysisDesc: Reviewsvisor transforms your reviews into insights in seconds, allowing you to make quick and reliable decisions. Thanks to a clear and visual synthesis, you identify key trends and action priorities that matter for your establishment. The analysis also highlights your strengths to consolidate what works.
whyWorks.immediatelyActionableDesc: Reviewsvisor doesn't just identify problems‚Ä¶ it proposes concrete and prioritized solutions. Each recommendation is measurable, linked to customer satisfaction, to help you act effectively and track your progress over time.
whyWorks.ultraPreciseAnalysisDesc: AI detects emotions, recurring problems and improvement opportunities with exceptional accuracy. It measures the tone of reviews and highlights weak signals to reveal the real customer loyalty levers.
whyWorks.measurableGrowthDesc: Reviewsvisor helps you increase your online rating, attract more customers and improve your revenue.
whyWorks.growthStat3: gain +0.5 to +1 point rating in a few weeks.

help.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions and discover how to use
help.teamHere: Our team is here to help you use
help.faq1Question: How do I import my reviews?
help.faq1Answer:
You can import your reviews in several ways:

1. **Manual import**: Use the import tool to paste reviews or upload a CSV/JSON file.

2. **Google import**: Connect your Google Business account to automatically sync your Google reviews.

3. **CSV import**: Upload a CSV file with your reviews (columns: review text, source, date).
help.faq2Question: How does the AI analysis work?
help.faq2Answer: Reviewsvisor uses advanced artificial intelligence to analyze your customer reviews. The tool reads each comment, identifies tone and emotion, extracts important keywords, and automatically detects strengths and weaknesses. You then get a clear summary with priority improvement areas.
help.faq3Answer: Yes! With the Pro subscription, you can manage multiple establishments from a single dashboard. Each location has its own reports, filters, and analyses, while maintaining a global view of group performance.
help.faq4Answer: Reviewsvisor uses artificial intelligence models trained on millions of real customer reviews. The average accuracy rate exceeds 90%, with continuous improvement through machine learning from new reviews analyzed.
help.faq5Answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through our secure Stripe payment system. Payment is processed securely and your subscription is activated immediately after payment confirmation.

features.title: Features of
features.subtitle: Transform your customer reviews into strategic insights with advanced AI analysis
features.seeReputationDesc1: Behind every rating, there's an emotion.
features.seeReputationDesc2: captures these nuances to offer you a human reading
features.seeReputationDesc3: of your reputation. You finally discover what your customers really feel.
features.intelligenceUnderstands: An intelligence that understands your customers
features.intelligenceDesc1: Our AI reads reviews like a person: it identifies tone, word choice, emotions, and dominant themes.
features.intelligenceDesc2: It transforms the noise of comments into a clear vision
features.clearActionDesc1: doesn't just analyze: it shows you where to act. In seconds,
features.clearActionDesc2: you identify areas to strengthen and those that already make a difference
features.visibleEvolutionDesc1: Your reputation is alive. Our tool tracks your progress, detects perception changes, and
features.visibleEvolutionDesc2: helps anticipate trends before they become critical
features.localGlobalDesc1: Whether you manage a single establishment or an entire network,
features.localGlobalDesc2: offers you a clear view of your performance at every scale. Compare your sites, identify regional differences, and
features.localGlobalDesc3: adjust your strategies where it matters most
features.reportsDesc1: Clear visuals, useful data, and accessible interpretation.
features.reportsDesc2: offers you the truth about your reputation
features.partnerNotJustTool: A partner, not just a tool
features.partnerDesc2: learns to know your establishment and guides you toward excellence
features.faq1Answer: Reviewsvisor uses advanced artificial intelligence to analyze your customer reviews. The tool reads each comment, identifies tone and emotion, extracts important keywords, and automatically detects strengths and weaknesses. You then get a clear summary with priority improvement areas.
features.faq2Question: How is Reviewsvisor different from a simple statistics tool?
features.faq2Answer: Reviewsvisor doesn't stop at numbers. The AI analyzes tone, vocabulary, and emotions in each review to reveal customers' true feelings. The tool identifies trends, strengths, and improvement areas, offering a strategic vision rather than a simple data table.
features.faq3Answer: The AI groups customer feedback by recurring themes (welcome, quality, price, service, ambiance, etc.). It measures the frequency and tone of each subject to establish a clear list of high-impact improvement priorities.
features.faq4Question: What is the accuracy of the analysis?
features.faq4Answer: Reviewsvisor uses artificial intelligence models trained on millions of real customer reviews. The average accuracy rate exceeds 90%, with continuous improvement through machine learning from new reviews analyzed.
features.faq5Question: Can AI detect fake reviews or suspicious reviews?
features.faq5Answer: Yes, partially. Reviewsvisor identifies suspicious reviews based on several signals: keyword repetition, unusual writing patterns, emotional extremes, or abnormal activity over a short period. This feature is designed to alert establishments to possible anomalies.
features.faq6Question: Can I compare my performance to that of my competitors?
features.faq6Answer: This feature is coming very soon! Reviewsvisor will soon integrate advanced competitive analysis, allowing you to compare your key indicators to those of your direct competitors. A true intelligent benchmarker to track your market position.
features.faq7Question: Can I connect multiple establishments to a single account?
features.faq7Answer: Yes. Reviewsvisor allows you to centralize the management of multiple establishments from a single dashboard. Each location has its own reports, filters, and analyses, while maintaining a global view of group performance.
